ai-ja162:1.2_0: Of he who has intimacy with a contemptible person.
ai-ja162:1.3_0: (The fire that) burned with ghee and with milk-rice
ai-ja162:1.4_0: Burned down my leaf-hut, made with much trouble.
ai-ja162:2.1_0: Nothing is better than the intimacy
ai-ja162:2.2_0: Of he who has intimacy with a Good Person.
ai-ja162:3.1_0: like a blade of famous appearance.
